column3:
but there is an urgent call for you. The pseudo-robot Caliban says he must speak with you at once.
Fredda sighed. She knew she had to take the call
column4: and that Caliban would only call if it were important. But even so
column5:
it was turning into a very long night.
"Now what time is it?" she asked.
"It is now 0429 hours
